column1: Which is the best next step in the workup and management of the patient?
Broaden antibiotics to?vancomycin?and?piperacillin tazobactam?and get sputum for bacteria
Refer the patient for bronchoscopy to get broncho-alveolar lavage cultures
Diagnose the patient with e-vaping induced lung injury and start the patient on?prednisone
Order?mycoplasma?antigen and continue empirically on azithromycin
